eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.listeners

Class PlayerCombatListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.listeners.PlayerCombatListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class PlayerCombatListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    A listener to catch events, related to player combat.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerCombatListener

        public PlayerCombatListener()

    • Method Detail

      • onDamage

        public void onDamage(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageEvent event)
        Handles general damage calculation. A combat mapper is used for mapping combat events to WauzCore functionalities.
        Parameters:
        event - The damage event.
        See Also:
        CombatMapper.handleDamageEvent(EntityDamageEvent)

      • onHeal

        public void onHeal(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityRegainHealthEvent event)
        Handles healing calculation in MMORPG mode. Also updates the boss bar if one exists.
        Parameters:
        event - The heal event.
        See Also:
        DamageCalculator.heal(EntityRegainHealthEvent), WauzPlayerBossBar.updateBossBar(double)

      • onKill

        public void onKill(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDeathEvent event)
        Handles the killing of entities in MMORPG mode. This handler focuses on effects like life leech caused by the player, not on the actual death or loot drops of the entity.
        Parameters:
        event - The death event.
        See Also:
        DamageCalculator.kill(EntityDeathEvent), "Real" death event handler

      • onItemDamage

        public void onItemDamage(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerItemDamageEvent event)
        Prevents item damage in MMORPG mode. The equipment there has its own durability system.
        Parameters:
        event - The item damage event.
        See Also:
        DurabilityCalculator
